markdownRemark.html: I am watching Ben Forta's keynote, and it if very heavy on Flex. Adobe annouced today the availablity of CFMX 7.0.2 nad Flex 2 today. Flex Builder 2 is selling for $499, and they have a free version Flex Data Services.

frontmatter.title: Ben Forta's keynote heavy on Flex
Ben says ColdFusion is much faster
Ben Forta responds to the Computerworld's shoddy journalism
